articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly Built Okryu Restaurant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly Built Okryu Restaurant
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, provided on-site guidance to the newly built Special Dish House of Okryu Restaurant. 
					The special dish house is another gift presented by Kim Jong Il to the Pyongyangites and all other people with his loving care as he always thinks of how to improve the people's diet. 
					
					With the appearance of the house which has a total floor space of more than 6 000 square meters and is capable of accommodating thousands of visitors, the area of Okryu Restaurant has turned into a street of catering facilities built in a peculiar Korean architectural style to be proud of. 
					
					Kim Jong Il looked round for hours the inside and outside of the elegant, magnificent and exquisite house, a good combination of national, classical and contemporary architectural styles, to learn in detail about its construction. 
					
					After acquainting himself in detail not only with the architectural style and substance of the house but with cooking utensils and furnishings in the dining rooms, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders built the house at the highest level as required by the architectural beauty of the new century by fully displaying the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					The house not only has good inner structure but it was constructed at a high level and it is flawless in its architectural substance and style, he said, extending high appreciation and thanks to the soldier-builders for having done good things for the sake of the people. 
					
					Noting that it is an astonishing miracle that they completed in a matter of half a year the modern special dish house, which will remain impeccable even in the distant future, he stressed that this eye-opening success is a striking demonstration of the inexhaustible mental power of the servicepersons, the creators of the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					He was greatly pleased that the appearance of the best special dish house as an annex to Okryu Restaurant, the catering centre for the people, which has long earned its fame as an icon of Korea standing on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong, made it possible for the restaurant for the people to shed its rays as a precious treasure of the Korean nation and the world's leading restaurant both in name and reality.
					
					Gigantic structures are now springing up one after another in various parts of the country and the wealth of the country is on the steady increase, enabling the Korean people to enjoy pleasure after undergoing pain, he noted, adding that the stirring reality of a thriving nation is on the horizon thanks to the inexhaustible mental power of the heroic Korean people who bravely weathered out all sorts of difficulties and trials. 
					
					Noting that Okryu Restaurant is a crystal of the great love, an embodiment of President Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in people as in Heaven, he said that it is the sacred duty and noble moral obligation to add shine to this valuable heritage generation after generation.
					
					Okryu Restaurant has an important role to play in improving the people's diet and giving fuller play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism, he said, setting forth important tasks to be carried out to manage and operate the restaurant.
					
					It is the intention and ideal of the Party to bring the level of the people's diet and food culture to the highest level as they will live in a thriving nation, he noted, underscoring the need for the special dish house of the restaurant to play the role as a pedigree eating house for the development of the country's culinary art.
					
					He stressed the need for the special dish house to serve not only Korean national dishes but a variety of dishes including turtle, salmon, sturgeon, quail and bullfrog dishes.
					
					When the house serves national and world famous dishes well, Okryu Restaurant will be more crowded with visitors and then famous dishes will spread across the country from here, he noted.
					
					He stressed that if this modern house is to pay off profusely, it is necessary to steadily raise the technical skills of the cookers, make a sufficient supply of foodstuffs and other things, ensure the hygienic safety at the restaurant and also pay deep attention to the management of the facilities.
					
					He together with the leading officials who accompanied him tasted Pyongyang cold noodle prepared by employees of the restaurant and appreciated it, saying that the original taste and tradition were preserved well in the noodle. 
					
					　He then expressed expectation that the restaurant would faithfully fulfill its duty as a catering establishment. 
					
					　He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, and Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Homage to Kim Il Sung Paid
articles.content:
Homage to Kim Il Sung Paid 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The delegations and delegates to the 6th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Sunday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay respect to President Kim Il Sung.
					 They bowed in humble reverence to the President who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of people and made undying feats for the development of the friendly relations among countries and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 They made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: DPRK Footballers Win at AFC U-19 Soccer Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Footballers Win at AFC U-19 Soccer Championship
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men football players took the first place at the 2010 Asian U-19 Soccer Championship held in China by beating the Australian team 3-2 in its finals.

articles.title: US Moves for Arms Buildup under Fire
articles.content:
US Moves for Arms Buildup under Fire 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Republican Party of the U.S. in the "commitment" made public with the Nov. 2 Congressional off-year election at hand revealed its attempt to put spurs to the arms buildup under the pretext of the "military threat" from the north.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The group of the Republican Party is hatching a terrific plot to put the whole world in the crucible of arms race by stepping up the establishment of the missile defense system while collecting a colossal amount of fund from people for the election campaign.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces are running wild in moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK to establish the domination over the whole of Korea at any cost, considering the Korean Peninsula as the strategic vantage for realizing the Asia strategy.
					
					 In March the U.S. imperialists egged south Korea on to orchestrate the case of sinking of a warship and groundlessly passed the buck for the case to the DPRK. They staged large-scale anti-DPRK war exercises one after another with the warmongers of south Korea, gravely threatening the sovereignty and security of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered the military capability to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation from the aggression of the U.S., not to threaten someone.
					
					 It is the spasmodic symptom of one seized by a war fever for the U.S. Republican Party to spark off arms race, while talking about the non-existent "threat" from someone.
					
					 The group of the Republican Party is miscalculated, however.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces are vociferating about someone's "threat" but it will get them nowhere.
					
					 Their rash act to realize the ambition for stifling the DPRK quite contrary to the trend of the times will only compel the DPRK to bolster the might of Songun and precipitate their self-destruction.
					
					 The group is bound to meet destruction for pursuing foolish moves to bring down the DPRK.

articles.title: Foolish Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Warmonger Condemned
articles.content:
Foolish Remarks of S. Korean Puppet Warmonger Condemned 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Hwang Ui Don, army chief of staff of south Korea, at the "inspection of state administration" that was opened at the headquarters of the army on Oct. 14 cried out for making clear the concept of the "principal enemy" and let loose the string of gibberish about "real principal enemy" in reference to the Workers' Party of Korea, the army and the power body of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This is vituperation which triggers off resentment of the people of the DPRK as it is an indication of the extreme hostility toward the DPRK. 
					
					 What matters is that those virulent outcries are not revelation of his private intention only.
					
					 It is already known that the theory of the "principal enemy" which faded away long ago emerged again after the present authorities took office in south Korea.
					
					 This has been stipulated in documents by some part of the military.
					
					 This shows that the present regime of south Korea is the group seized with hostility toward the DPRK and a group of traitors keen on confrontation and war.
					
					 In actuality, the conservative group has persistently committed the moves for a war of aggression against the north in collusion with foreign forces while chilling the mounting spirit of the south Korean people for reunification through alliance with the north and whipping up the atmosphere of confrontation.
					
					 Recently, it made a fuss calling for defining the north as the "principal enemy" in the "defense white paper", grumbling that the "Cheonan" case fabricated by them was the "result caused by the delete of the phrases of the principal enemy".
					
					 The situation proves that the south Korean authorities, in reality, still remain unchanged in pursuing confrontation and war despite their lip-service to "dialogue".
					
					 The racket of the "principal enemy" kicked up by the south Korean warmongers should be stopped at once.
					
					 If those confrontational maniacs continue to commit such provocative acts as the racket of the "principal enemy" while pursuing only the ambition to invade the north, far from reconciliation and cooperation with the fellow countrymen, the tension on the Korean Peninsula will never ease and the inter-Korean relations can never escape catastrophe.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely cope with the conservative group if it persists in the moves for confrontation between the north and the south and a war of aggression against the north, quite contrary to the trend of the times.

articles.title: WPK Praised for Inheriting Glorious Tradition of DIU
articles.content:
WPK Praised for Inheriting Glorious Tradition of DIU
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a signed article to the anniversary of the publication of Gneral Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU".
					 The work, published on October 17, 1982, clarifies the historic significance of the organization of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) and the valuable experience gained in building a revolutionary party of Juche type as well as tasks and ways for eternally glorifying President Kim Il Sung's idea on party building and his exploits for it.
					
					 The WPK is a revolutionary party holding fast to the principle of independence put forward by the DIU, ever-victorious vanguard ranks steadily carrying forward the tradition of the single-minded unity of the DIU and a militant party enlisting the inexhaustible strength of the popular masses to achieve the prosperity of the country by inheriting the tradition of the DIU, says the article, and goes on:
					
					 The faith and will cherished by the passionate fighters of the DIU who pioneered the era of independence on the basis of the revolutionary Juche idea of the President despite whatever storm and stress serve as the foundation of the party building and activities.  Steadfast is the stand of the WPK to mercilessly punish the imperialists with the might of Songun and build an independent and prosperous ideal society for people on this land, a goal set by the DIU.
					
					 The WPK replete with the great Juche idea, the Songun idea is giving continuity to the glorious revolutionary traditions of the leader. The noblest and the most ardent comradeship of the DIU serves as a revolutionary philosophy of the WPK and the foundation of the single-minded unity and the spirit of defending Hanbyol displayed by the revolutionary martyrs has been carried forward by all the party members as the spirit of devotedly safeguarding the headquarters of the revolution today. 
					
					 The WPK is the great party which thoroughly embodies the revolutionary mass line and gives full play to the inexhaustible mental power of the popular masses to bring about a revolutionary surge and the mother party which takes care of the destiny and future of the people with responsibility to the last while bringing all happiness under socialism to them. This is the genuine appearance of the WPK enjoying absolute support and confidence by all the servicepersons and people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Promising Future of WPK and Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Promising Future of WPK and Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Rosy future is in store for the glorious Korean revolution which has won great victories and brought about epochal changes under the uplifted banner of the Down-with Imperialism Union, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung organized the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) on October 17, Juche 15(1926), which was an epoch-making event in carrying out the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The program of the DIU became the foundation of the program of the Workers' Party of Korea, the principle of independence put forward by the DIU served as the principle of the party building and activities and the revolutionaries of the new generation trained by the DIU grew to be backbone for founding the WPK. The praiseworthy appearance of the DIU is clearly reflected in the character and feature of the WPK.
					
					 The great vitality of the tradition of the DIU has been fully demonstrated in the protracted course of the Korean revolution.
					
					Thanks to the valuable tradition provided by the DIU the WPK could develop into an ideologically pure entity, organizationally integral body and experienced and seasoned guiding force of the Songun revolution. Under the guidance of the WPK the DPRK could demonstrate its might as a power strong in policy and ideology, strong in military capability and modern in science and technology.
					
					 All the victories and successes achieved by the Korean people in the revolution and construction upholding the banner of the independence and single-minded unity were made in the course of embodying the idea of the DIU.
					
					 Steady adherence to the tradition of the DIU provides a sure guarantee for the eternal rosy future of the country and the revolution. This is a noble truth taught by the over 80 year-long history of the Korean revolution which has emerged victorious under the banner of the DIU.
					
					 At the recent Conference of the WPK General Secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected as its general secretary. It was a manifestation of the steadfast faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to successfully inherit the invincible history of the Korean revolution and open a bright future of Songun Korea holding fast to the tradition of the DIU. Thanks to Kim Jong Il the high authority and the invincible might of the WPK giving a steady continuity to the tradition of the DIU are ensured and the rosy future of prosperity is in store for the DPRK.
					
					 Everyone should struggle more vigorously to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started from the DIU, rallied close around the WPK which leads the country and the revolution to victory with a great history and tradition, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: GNP's Politically-Motivated Bargaining Dismissed
articles.content:
GNP's Politically-Motivated Bargaining Dismissed
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea called a press conference on Oct. 12 and denounced the "Grand National Party" for its despicable bargaining for achieving political purpose.
					 He referred to the fact that on the same day the GNP group called for passing through the "National Assembly" session the proposals raised by it together with the proposal for forming a NA special committee to verify the propriety of the improvement project of four big rivers advanced by the opposition party.
					
					 This bargaining brought into bolder relief the intention of the GNP engrossed in attaining its political and tactical purposes, clean indifferent to the deteriorating people's living and the economy going bankrupt, he said, adding:
					
					 The GNP group did not really mean it when it offered the formation of the above-said special committee, an issue they have turned aside for months.
					
					 The bargaining to meet only political and tactical interests is no more than a hypocritical farce to deceive the opposition party and the people.

articles.title: Will to Struggle for Equality and Freedom Reiterated
articles.content:
Will to Struggle for Equality and Freedom Reiterated
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Event Marking 40th Death Anniversary of Youth Chon Tae Il of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Oct. 12 and expressed its will to fight for genuine life.
					 At the meeting speakers recalled that four decades ago Chon Tae Il set himself on fire, crying for the right to workers. His suicide flared up the struggle to build a world in which people lead a life worthy of human being, they said.
					
					 They called on the people to pool efforts to realize his desire.
					
					 A declaration read out at the meeting underscored the need to overcome present trials and difficulties in the same spirit of resistance as displayed by Chon.
					
					 The declaration called on the people from all walks of life to wage a dynamic struggle to stamp out all social evils and build a genuine world in which equality and freedom are fully ensured.

articles.title: Scientific Inaccuracy of Final Report on "Cheonan" Case Exposed
articles.content:
Scientific Inaccuracy of Final Report on "Cheonan" Case Exposed
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The media committee for verification of investigation into the truth behind the "Cheonan" case grouping three press organizations including the Journalist Association of south Korea held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Oct. 12 to expose the scientific inaccuracy of the final report released by the puppet Ministry of Defense.
					 The organization at the press conference held that the final report on the "Cheonan" case was confirmed to be distortion of the truth.
					
					 It said that the analysis of adsorptive material extracted from the hull of ship "Cheonan" and torpedo and the result of the experiment of the underwater explosion, etc, gave the lie to the story of the torpedo attack by the north.
					
					 The testimony of soldiers that they saw the column of water at the time of accident was what was distorted and fabricated by the "government", it said, noting that there is high possibility that the case could have been masterminded by the military.
					
					 The organization demanded the "government" thoroughly probe the truth behind the case, though belatedly.

articles.title: Reelection of Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Reelection of Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of WPK Celebrated 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions, seminars and film shows took place in Britain, Italy, Mongolia, Cambodia, Pakistan and Bulgaria between Oct. 4 and 9 on the occasions of the reelection of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos showing their undying party building leadership exploits and books and photos introducing the 65 year-long history of victory and glory of the WPK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist－Leninist), and other speakers said that they would conduct brisk solidarity activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people to frustrate the anti-DPRK moves of the hostile forces and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, said that the Korean people are sure to defend the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the socialist cause and always achieve victory in the struggle to realize the reunification of the country, thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary general of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia said that the Conference of the WPK reelected Kim Jong Il as its general secretary reflecting the unanimous wish of all the party members, servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Trade Union Federation said that the WPK led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il would as ever demonstrate the ever-victorious might.
					
					 The participants of the film shows appreciated Korean films showing the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the functions held in Pakistan and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported in Democratic Congo 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, the Working Citizens' Association and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association issued a joint statement on Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement noted that President Kim Il Sung set forth the most fair and aboveboard proposal for achieving the national reunification by federal formula at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Kim Il Sung set forth the proposal commanding sympathy from all the Koreans, great feat that would shine long in the history of the reunification movement of the Korean nation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il formulated the three charters for national reunification and provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, milestone for reunification of Korea, by embodying Kim Il Sung's idea of loving the country, the nation and the people.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the proposal, endorsing it as the most reasonable and realistic proposal for the reunification which most correctly reflects the three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- and the specific conditions of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement demanded the present south Korean authorities stop at once the moves of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen against reunification and respect the will of all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to reunify the country according to the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It also demanded the U.S., chieftain of Korea's division, halt all sorts of moves hampering the reunification of Korea and enforce the policy toward the DPRK in the direction of giving help to providing environment favorable for the peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Realization of Proposal for Founding DFRK Called for
articles.content:
Realization of Proposal for Founding DFRK Called for
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany released a joint appeal on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The appeal noted that this year is a significant one marking the 30th anniversary of the proposal.
					
					 Saying that the present grave situation is highlighting the urgency of realizing the proposal, it held that this proposal is a bright one for reunification guaranteeing the life and safety of the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas supporting the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration should turn out in the patriotic drive for materializing the proposal, the appeal stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- General Secertary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on Oct. 8.
					 The work, published on Aug. 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification, formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification based on them.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued its bulletin on Oct. 5 to congratulate Gnenral Secretary  Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article recalled that Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the WPK according to the unanimous wish of all the Korean people, noting that it is a manifestation of the absolute support of all the WPK members, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the people for him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is enjoying high respect and confidence from the party, the army and the people as he has completely embodied the idea of President Kim Il Sung and led the Korean revolution only to victory, it noted.
					
					 Referring to the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union, the historical roots of the WPK, the article noted that the idea, line, strategy and tactics of the WPK serve as guidelines which brightly indicate the way for realizing the cause of independence against imperialism in the world.
					
					 The Ecuadorian Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People released the 10th issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 65th birthday of the WPK and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
